problem.markdown:
Which of the following statements about recursion is true when assuming the worst case run time for a recursive function? ( ) Recursion is often used to improve run time of code. ( ) Recursive functions have logarithmic run time. (x) Recursion can never run in constant time.
[explanation] Recursive functions, although elegant, cannot run in constant time due to the fact that they call themselves. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following statements about recursion is true when assuming the worst case run time for a recursive function?
